MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB810302599
Licensee Name: Fostering Futures
Licensee Address: Suite 200
7600 Grand River
Brighton, MI 48114
Licensee Telephone #: (734) 417-4287
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Jennifer DeVivo, Administrator
Name of Facility: Fostering Futures
Facility Address: East Suite
2050 East Washtenaw Ave
Ypsilanti, MI 48197
Facility Telephone #: (734) 417-4287
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
On February 25, 2011, this consultant received a letter requesting that the office
location for Fostering Futures be changed to 2050 East Washtenaw Ave, East Suite,
Ypsilanti, MI 48197, as the agency was consolidating two office locations.
III. Methodology
This consultant toured the new office location and spoke to the Director.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
It has been determined that the agency has secured appropriate office space to
meet the requirements of R 400.12204. The new office location in about one mile
from the previous office and is located in the same county. The license number shall
remain the same.
V. Recommendation
Based on the review of the new office location, it is recommended that the agency
continue with their regular license.
________________________________________
Kari Muntean Date: 3/17/11
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
03/17/2011
